reviews.review:
Is this review necessary? There can't be anyone left who hasn't played and loved the Portal games :D
I picked this up about 5 years ago just because it was on offer (buy one copy and get another to gift to a friend) and that was one of the best decisions I've ever made. It builds on the unique portal mechanic of the first game, picking up the dark storyline and humour, and introducing the AI Wheatley, a counterfoil to the player's nemesis, Glados. Gameplay is much the same as the first, but with even more fiendish puzzles in a much bigger game. The multiplayer co op mode is a blast too, and you'll easily find yourself coming back to chase down achievements because the game is so much fun,
One of the best games I have ever played! I highly recommend this game!

amazing game. amazing gameplay. amazing story. amazing characters. amazing everything.

a game for ever

este juego es buenisimo en un monton de aspectos mecanicas, los niveles, dialogos, referencias, secretos y la ambientacion pero para mi unas de las cosas mas entra√±ables de este juego son Wheatly y glados pero bueno las mecanicas estan mucho mas pulidas que el anterior juego (Cosa que se nota) y tambien las nuevas mecanicas como por ejemplo: El cubo que reflecta el rayo, los dise√±os de niveles estan bien hechos, los dialogos de voz son muy buenos por ejemplo el dialogo que Wheatly hace un acento argentino me cague de risa y bueno recomendado

My god, you got to be kidding me. You have a good computer, money in your bank account, a steam account and you still don¬¥t have this game?!?!?! Buy it as soon as it¬¥s on sale. One of  (if not) the best puzzle games I¬¥ve ever played. While on sale it¬¥s dirty cheap. You can easily play this and portal "1" in one afternoon and have the experience of a lifetime. So go up there, and SMASH that "add to cart" button and buy it!
